yield_conditions.description: With lower concentration of sodium phosphomolybdate hydrate (0.01 g, 0.005 mmol; 0.02 g, 0.01 mmol; 0.03 g, 0.015 mmol), mixture of products were isolated. Pure octahedral colorless crystals were found with 0.04 g (0.02 mmol) or higher concentration.

synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The reaction without sodium phosphomolybdate resulted in ZIF-65-SOD crystals as pure phase.

synthesis_conditions.description: The same reaction conditions as MOZIF-1 but without sodium phosphomolybdate resulted in ZIF-65-SOD crystals as pure phase.
